summary: Scales up the Khajiit claw damage to roughly equal to the player\'s level.  Maximum of +200 at level 193+.
descriptionHtml: So this scales up Khajiit claw damage as you level up.  You get about one point of bonus damage per level after the first 12, so a level 50-ish character will have bonus claw damage of about 50 points.  The minimum is 12, so a beginning character won\'t be worse off.  It maxes at 200 points at level 193 and above, because adding more levels at that point seemed silly.
author: Spicycat
